Package ch.hslu.ad.exercises.sw05.balls

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hslu.ad.exercises.sw05.balls.Circle
  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
    Version:
    2016.02.29
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Circle()
      Create a new circle at default position with default color.
      Circle​(int diameter, int xPosition, int yPosition, java.lang.String color)
      Create a new circle at specific position and color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeColor​(java.lang.String newColor)
      Change the color.Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta" and "black".
      void changeSize​(int newDiameter)
      Change the size to the new size (in pixels).Size must be greater than 0.
      int getDiameter()  
      int getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the circle.
      int getY()
      Returns y-coordinate of the circle.
      void makeInvisible()
      Make this circle invisible.
      void makeVisible()
      Make this circle visible.
      void moveDown()
      Move the circle a few pixels down.
      void moveHorizontal​(int distance)
      Move the circle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
      void moveLeft()
      Move the circle a few pixels to the left.
      void moveRight()
      Move the circle a few pixels to the right.
      void moveUp()
      Move the circle a few pixels up.
      void moveVertical​(int distance)
      Move the circle vertically by 'distance' pixels.
      void slowMoveHorizontal​(int distance)
      Slowly move the circle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
      void slowMoveVertical​(int distance)
      Slowly move the circle vertically by 'distance' pixels.

        diameter - diameter of the circle.

        yPosition - y position of the circle.
